prompt: Chiikawastyle,Usagi,This is a digital drawing in a cute, cartoon style. The main subject is Usagi, an anthropomorphic white bunny with large, expressive eyes, pink blush on its cheeks, and small pink ears. Usagi is sitting at a table, holding a slice of pizza with a slice of pepperoni and a green basil leaf. The pizza is on a white plate with a golden-brown crust and topped with red tomato sauce and melted cheese. To the right of the plate is a glass of cola with a red straw. The background is plain white, emphasizing the characters and food.
